step.datasource:
SELECT TOP (1000) ag.ID, ctg.cnt_id as ContactPerson, ag.ContactPerson as contactOld --, cg.debnr, cg.cmp_name --, ctg.FullName as newContact, ctg2.FullName as oldContact --, ctg.cnt_email as newContactEmail, ctg2.cnt_email as oldContactEmail FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code -- Select the first created for the criteria, to eliminate duplicates (for main account) CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = a.ESE_cnt_id ORDER BY ctg.syscreated ASC) as ctg -- Invoice address INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) ON ag.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag.Type = a.Type --AND ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id --INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg2 WITH (NOLOCK) -- ON ctg2.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg2.cnt_id = ag.ContactPerson WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only
AND a.Type = 'INV'
-- Difference between contact person ID AND ag.ContactPerson <> ctg.cnt_id
AND ctg.cnt_email IS NOT NULL -- extra check, don't overwrite when new one is empty
AND a.ESE_sysmodified > ag.sysmodified ORDER BY cmp_name

SELECT TOP 100 ag.ID, cg.cmp_wwn as Account, ctg.cnt_id as ContactPerson, ag.ID AS AddressID ,a.[Type] ,a.[AddressLine1] ,a.[AddressLine2] ,a.[AddressLine3] ,a.[PostCode] ,a.[City] ,a.[StateCode] ,a.[County] ,a.[Country] ,a.[Phone] ,a.[Fax] ,a.[Notes] ,a.[KeepSameAsVisit] ,CONVERT(int, a.[IsTaxable]) AS IsTaxable ,CONVERT(bit, a.[Main]) AS Main FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = a.ESE_cnt_id INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) ON ag.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id AND ag.Type = a.Type WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only
AND (a.ESE_sysmodified > ag.sysmodified -- modified OR (ag.syscreated = ag.sysmodified ) --OR ag.[AddressLine1] != a.[AddressLine1] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT -- new, maybe we have to update the adresses too ) ORDER BY account, ag.ID

SELECT cg.cmp_wwn as Account, ctg.cnt_id as ContactPerson, a.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = a.ESE_cnt_id WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id AND ag.Type = a.Type) -- Only one INV address per customer AND (a.Type != 'INV' OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag2.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag2.Type = a.Type)) -- Only one VIS address per customer AND (a.Type != 'VIS' OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag2.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag2.Type = a.Type)) -- Only one type of address per contact AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id AND ag.Type = a.Type)

SELECT ag.ID, ag.Account, ag.ContactPerson ,a.Type ,CAST(a.AddressLine1 as varchar(100)) AddressLine1,CAST(a.AddressLine2 as varchar(100)) AddressLine2,a.AddressLine3 ,a.PostCode,a.City,a.StateCode,a.County,a.Country,a.Phone,a.Fax ,a.Notes--,a.KeepSameAsVisit ,a.datefield1,a.datefield2,a.datefield3,a.datefield4,a.datefield5 ,a.numberfield1,a.numberfield2,a.numberfield3,a.numberfield4,a.numberfield5 ,a.YesNofield1,a.YesNofield2,a.YesNofield3,a.YesNofield4,a.YesNofield5 ,a.textfield1,a.textfield2,a.textfield3,a.textfield4,a.textfield5 ,a.CustomerReq,a.PoNumber,a.InvoiceType,a.DamageWaiver,a.InvoiceFrequency --,a.Main ,a.AddressCode,a.SalesPersonNumber,a.ShipVia,a.UPSZone,a.warehouse ,a.IsTaxable ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as datemodified -- update modified date FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [400].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code INNER JOIN [400].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = a.ESE_cnt_id INNER JOIN [400].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) ON ag.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id AND ag.Type = a.Type WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only --AND ag.ID = '5DE34D3A-281C-4617-92CD-00081058B460' --UNION ALL EXCEPT SELECT a.ESE_address_id, cg.cmp_wwn,a.ESE_cnt_id,a.Type ,a.AddressLine1 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.AddressLine2 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.AddressLine3 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ,a.PostCode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.City COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.StateCode COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.County COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.Country COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.Phone COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.Fax COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ,a.Notes COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT--,a.KeepSameAsVisit ,a.datefield1,a.datefield2,a.datefield3,a.datefield4,a.datefield5 ,a.numberfield1,a.numberfield2,a.numberfield3,a.numberfield4,a.numberfield5 ,a.YesNofield1,a.YesNofield2,a.YesNofield3,a.YesNofield4,a.YesNofield5 ,a.textfield1 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.textfield2 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.textfield3 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.textfield4 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.textfield5 COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ,a.CustomerReq,a.PoNumber COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.InvoiceType,a.DamageWaiver,a.InvoiceFrequency --,a.Main ,a.AddressCode,a.SalesPersonNumber,a.ShipVia COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.UPSZone COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT,a.warehouse ,a.IsTaxable ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as datemodified -- update modified date FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses_400 a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [400].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only --AND a.ESE_Address_id = '5DE34D3A-281C-4617-92CD-00081058B460'

SELECT TOP (1000) ag.ID, ctg.cnt_id as ContactPerson, ag.ContactPerson as contactOld --, cg.debnr, cg.cmp_name --, ctg.FullName as newContact, ctg2.FullName as oldContact --, ctg.cnt_email as newContactEmail, ctg2.cnt_email as oldContactEmail FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code -- Select the first created for the criteria, to eliminate duplicates (for main account) CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = a.ESE_cnt_id ORDER BY ctg.syscreated ASC) as ctg -- Invoice address INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) ON ag.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag.Type = a.Type --AND ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id --INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg2 WITH (NOLOCK) -- ON ctg2.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg2.cnt_id = ag.ContactPerson WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only
AND a.Type = 'INV'
-- Difference between contact person ID AND ag.ContactPerson <> ctg.cnt_id
AND ctg.cnt_email IS NOT NULL -- extra check, don't overwrite when new one is empty
AND a.ESE_sysmodified > ag.sysmodified ORDER BY cmp_name

SELECT TOP 100 ag.ID, cg.cmp_wwn as Account, ctg.cnt_id as ContactPerson, ag.ID AS AddressID ,a.[Type] ,a.[AddressLine1] ,a.[AddressLine2] ,a.[AddressLine3] ,a.[PostCode] ,a.[City] ,a.[StateCode] ,a.[County] ,a.[Country] ,a.[Phone] ,a.[Fax] ,a.[Notes] ,a.[KeepSameAsVisit] ,CONVERT(int, a.[IsTaxable]) AS IsTaxable ,CONVERT(bit, a.[Main]) AS Main FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = a.ESE_cnt_id INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) ON ag.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id AND ag.Type = a.Type WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only AND (a.ESE_sysmodified > ag.sysmodified -- modified OR (ag.syscreated = ag.sysmodified)-- AND ag.[AddressLine1] != a.[AddressLine1] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT) -- new, maybe we have to update the adresses too )

SELECT cg.cmp_wwn as Account, ctg.cnt_id as ContactPerson, a.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = a.ESE_cnt_id WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id AND ag.Type = a.Type) -- Only one INV address per customer AND (a.Type != 'INV' OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag2.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag2.Type = a.Type)) -- Only one VIS address per customer AND (a.Type != 'VIS' OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag2.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag2.Type = a.Type)) -- Only one type of address per contact AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id AND ag.Type = a.Type)

SELECT TOP (1000) ag.ID, ctg.cnt_id as ContactPerson, ag.ContactPerson as contactOld --, cg.debnr, cg.cmp_name --, ctg.FullName as newContact, ctg2.FullName as oldContact --, ctg.cnt_email as newContactEmail, ctg2.cnt_email as oldContactEmail FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code -- Select the first created for the criteria, to eliminate duplicates (for main account) CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = a.ESE_cnt_id ORDER BY ctg.syscreated ASC) as ctg -- Invoice address INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) ON ag.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag.Type = a.Type --AND ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id --INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg2 WITH (NOLOCK) -- ON ctg2.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg2.cnt_id = ag.ContactPerson WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only
AND a.Type = 'INV'
-- Difference between contact person ID AND ag.ContactPerson <> ctg.cnt_id
AND ctg.cnt_email IS NOT NULL -- extra check, don't overwrite when new one is empty
AND a.ESE_sysmodified > ag.sysmodified ORDER BY cmp_name

SELECT TOP 100 ag.ID, cg.cmp_wwn as Account, ctg.cnt_id as ContactPerson, ag.ID AS AddressID ,a.[Type] ,a.[AddressLine1] ,a.[AddressLine2] ,a.[AddressLine3] ,a.[PostCode] ,a.[City] ,a.[StateCode] ,a.[County] ,a.[Country] ,a.[Phone] ,a.[Fax] ,a.[Notes] ,a.[KeepSameAsVisit] ,CONVERT(int, a.[IsTaxable]) AS IsTaxable ,CONVERT(bit, a.[Main]) AS Main FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = a.ESE_cnt_id INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) ON ag.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id AND ag.Type = a.Type WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only AND (a.ESE_sysmodified > ag.sysmodified -- modified OR (ag.syscreated = ag.sysmodified)-- AND ag.[AddressLine1] != a.[AddressLine1] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT) -- new, maybe we have to update the adresses too )

SELECT cg.cmp_wwn as Account, ctg.cnt_id as ContactPerson, a.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = a.ESE_cnt_id WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id AND ag.Type = a.Type) -- Only one INV address per customer AND (a.Type != 'INV' OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag2.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag2.Type = a.Type)) -- Only one VIS address per customer AND (a.Type != 'VIS' OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag2.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag2.Type = a.Type)) -- Only one type of address per contact AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id AND ag.Type = a.Type)
